Description: Methanol Chemicals Co (known as: CHEMANOL) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2008. CHEMANOL operates within the Materials sector focusing on Diversified Chemicals. CHEMANOL is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 1989.
